item.title: [HIVE-19837] Setting to have different default location for external tables
item.description: Allow external tables to have a different default location than managed tables
item.summary: Setting to have different default location for external tables

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12927149 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

Updated patch to fix failures, this patch also includes HIVE-19861 which was responsible for many of the failures.
Simply updated the golden file for TestMiniLlapLocalCliDriver.testCliDriver.mm_exim - looks like there's some weird logic regarding table stats which is causing the stats to be 0 in the import case.
